Abilities: Str 21, Dex 14, Con 15, Int 6, Wis 15, Cha 10
Feats: Alertness, Cleave, Flyby Attack, Power Attack

Combate: Hieracosphinxes can make short work of even the most dangerous opponents with their claws. They are not particularly intelligent, but are cunning enough to dive at their enemies from above with their flying ability.Rake (Ex): Attack bonus +13 melee, damage 1d6+2.Skills: Hieracosphinxes have a +4 racial bonus on Spot checks.SEE WIKIPEDIA ENTRY: Sphinx
